description: This file defines security-related utility functions for handling password hashing, JWT token creation and decoding, including creating access and refresh tokens with specific claims.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verify a plain password against a hashed password using bcrypt.

methods.name: str _create_token( data: Dict[str, Any], expires_delta: Optional[timedelta], token_type: str, )
methods.description: Create a JWT token with specified claims and expiration.

methods.name: str create_access_token( subject: str, tenant_id: str, roles: list[str] | None = None, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None, extra: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Create a signed access token with subject, tenant, roles, and optional expiration.

methods.name: str create_refresh_token( subject: str, tenant_id: str, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None )
methods.description: Create a signed refresh token with subject and tenant, with optional expiration.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str)
methods.description: Decode and validate a JWT token; raises JWTError if invalid or expired.

methods.name: Optional[str] get_token_subject(token: str)
methods.description: Extract the 'sub' claim from a token; returns None if token is invalid.

ctags.signature: ( subject: str, tenant_id: str, expires_minutes: Optional[int] = None )
